ygData.subject: Re: Attention Tech heads
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes..make sure you have the Lastes Drivers for the following: Vidoe Card Sound Card Modem the bst place to find drivers is your MFG website...but...failing
ygData.messageBody:
Yes..make sure you have the Lastes Drivers for the following:

Vidoe Card
Sound Card
Modem

the bst place to find drivers is your MFG website...but...failing
that...goto http://www.drivershq.com good source of driver information

~ Auraelle MacFadyen ~
~Priestess of Veeshan~
~ Follower of Tunare ~
~ Lords of Light ~

E'ci
